Tips to help your baby take medicine easily
Vegetable oil helps to remove buffalo ducks on baby"s head
How to completely drain saliva, nasal or food on the baby face

A small tip to help your baby take the pill is to munch a small hole in the tip of the nipple and insert the medication. Or you can use a bottle of milk instead of a hole. When baby is sucking penny, she just need to give medicine to drink. Too simple right?
Mom can help her by refraining from putting her to sit on her mother"s thighs and using her mother"s leg to move her baby"s body into a lap while holding her head still.

Baby sleepwear will help your baby move better than normal clothes or pajamas. In addition, the lower part helps keep the feet and lower body warm.
When buying baby clothes priority to select the lock, press the button. This helps to change the baby"s clothes more quickly.

Coconut oil is able to moisturize the skin with inflammation of sebum easily. Just apply a little coconut oil to your baby"s skin then use a lightweight comb to remove the peeling skin.
Mother can use vegetable oil such as coconut oil, olive oil to clean the mucus on baby"s ass
Small, dedicated nose cutter, which can be used to cut baby"s nails safely. Or you can use nail files.

You can apply the "bath towel" to those who do not like bathing. Mothers wrap the baby in a soft cloth or cloth and carefully gently wipe both hands and feet. Then wash and rewind, wipe the other parts.

You can use a small mattress called a changing pad, which is a kind of mattress to lie on when changing diapers. They are very convenient because they can be placed on a flat surface with the right height so there is no need to bend over to change the baby diaper. When using this type of mattress, mother can put a lining pad on the mattress to ensure the mattress is always clean, cool.
You can use a wet towel to rub under the baby"s navel before changing diapers. If your baby is depressed, he or she will urinate in the bladder. So you will prevent the urine on the mother when changing diapers.
If the house has many floors, you need to prepare some diapers, creams, wipes and trash on each floor so that you do not have to go up and down several times.
Mother should be prepared in advance for her baby. Never wait to run away to buy.
You should not throw away the new diaper just because its paste is loose or sticky. Just use a personal patch or medical bandage as the back pad can be used normally.

Baby sleepwear will help your baby move better than normal clothes or pajamas. In addition, the lower part helps keep the feet and lower body warm.
When buying baby clothes priority to select the lock, press the button. This helps to change the baby"s clothes more quickly.
Mother should hold the baby in the shape of a ball hug (hugging her across a cotton pad with her right arm) and wash her head under the kitchen faucet. This will help the mother reduce bath time.

Sweater or maternity sweatshirt can be recycled into neck or necklaces. These materials are capable of absorbing droplets, nasal drops or baby food.
The way to do is as follows: mother cut a piece of sleeves and then wrapped over the baby"s head, the sleeve on the upper side. So, I have a good neck for your baby.

When you go out to play, you need to have a bag that includes everything you need for your baby such as a paper napkin, milk bottle, face towel, nipple ... to be taken out at any time.
To carry a baby car seat, mother should cut a soft sponge shaped tubing and attach to the handle. This helps the mother to have pain when carrying her chair.
